availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jeremiah D. Lillard (Owen County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph S. Lillard and George Ann Lillard. Married to Molly Holton Lillard in Gallatin County, Kentucky, on April 20, 1856. Graduate of the University of Louisville School of Law in Louisville in 1853. Laborer in Gallatin County in 1850. Attorney in Owen County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin County, p. 163B.
